Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.notebook

Class Notebook

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.notebook.Notebook
public class Notebook extends Object
Class that controls the main actions of the task lists

Foster Nelson

      public void editTaskList(String taskListName)
      Method to edit the given task list
      Parameters:
      taskListName - name of the task list to be edited
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the active tasks lists is edited
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is Active Tasks or the name already exists

      taskName - name of the task
      taskDescription - description for the task
      recurring - whether the task is recurring
